name: typescript-starter
description: A typescript starter for building javascript libraries and projects
author: Jason Dreyzehner <jason@dreyzehner.com>

scripts.build: trash build && yarn build:main && yarn build:module && yarn build:browser-deps && yarn build:browser && yarn build:browser-cjs && yarn build:resolve-sourcemaps
scripts.build:browser-deps: mkdirp build/temp && browserify node_modules/hash.js/lib/hash.js --standalone hash -o build/temp/hash.js
scripts.unit: yarn build && yarn build:tests && nyc ava
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn unit && yarn check-coverage
scripts.watch: yarn build && yarn build:tests -- --no-browser && concurrently -r --kill-others 'npm run --silent build:main -- -w' 'npm run --silent build:tests -- -w --no-browser' 'sleepms 2000 && ava --watch'
scripts.cov: yarn unit && yarn html-coverage && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.docs: typedoc src/index.ts --excludePrivate --exclude src/adapters/*.ts --mode file --theme minimal --out build/docs && opn build/docs/index.html

scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.watch:build: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes
scripts-info.watch:unit: Watch the build, rerun relevant tests on changes
scripts-info.cov: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.send-coverage: Output lcov test coverage report and send it to codecov
scripts-info.docs: Generate API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.release: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag a release
